We’re looking for a passionate, experienced Software Engineer to join our team. This role plays an essential part of the Moveworks AI product ecosystem. The ability to leverage ML intelligence for the frontend makes it innovative and fun! You’ll have a different playground to work on web UI here. Your work will impact every customer and the productivity of cross-functional teams at Moveworks. In other words, we needed you here yesterday!

This role at Moveworks is unlike most other frontend roles and encompasses a variety of projects across the entire company. As Conversational UI is more limited than Web UI, and chat adoption level varies for each customer, you will be building out a hybrid UI with both Chat and Web to deliver the optimal end-user experience. Additionally, you will be taking our Production Admin UI to the next level, to scale our enterprise customer base fast. Last, (but not finally) you will be building out a data and annotation tooling pipeline, which is key in ML training and feedback loops for our product development. You will be deeply involved in design and shipping code daily and will see the immediate impact of your work. This is an opportunity to play an integral role at the fastest-growing AI startup in its space.

Who we are:

Moveworks is revolutionizing how companies support their employees — with the first AI platform that makes getting help at work effortless. Using advanced conversational AI built for the enterprise, Moveworks gives employees exactly what they need, from IT support to HR help to policy information. Our platform allows customers like DocuSign, Broadcom, and Western Digital to move forward on what matters.

Founded in 2016, Moveworks has raised $315 million in funding, at a valuation of $2.1 billion. We’ve been named to the Forbes AI 50 list for three consecutive years, while earning recognition as the Best Chatbot Solution at the 2021 AI Breakthrough Awards. Above all, we’ve built an AI company that puts people first, which is why both Inc. and the San Francisco Business Times called Moveworks one of the Best Workplaces of 2021.

Come join one of the fastest-growing teams on the planet!

What you’ll do:

  • Work closely with the product and engineering teams to augment end-user experience, find creative solutions to fill in gaps in technology, and increase chat adoption for customers
  • Work closely with the Customer Success team to design and implement an admin UI for real-time visibility and control of the production system
  • Work closely with the Machine Learning and Annotation team to design and implement highly efficient and high impact tooling UI for various product areas
  • Think strategically about the future of frontend within conversational AI and be prepared to try new things
  • Promote best practices and standards to build modular and scalable web apps and APIs between backend services
  • Improve collaboration process between cross-functional teams
  • Find and address front-end performance issues
  • Implement automated tests, participate in code reviews, and ship code on a daily basis

What you bring to the table:

  • BS or higher degree in computer science or a related field, or equivalent relevant experience
  • 3+ years of professional development experience building complex web applications
  • Experience with a major Web UI framework (e.g. ReactJS) and experience building UI at scale
  • A good sense of product design and cross-functional collaboration skills
  • Proficient in at least one or more modern browser technologies such as JavaScript, React, MaterialUI, WebPack, NodeJS, TypeScript
  • A constant thirst for learning and a willingness to get out of your comfort zone

Nice to haves:

  • Experience working with Machine Learning products
  • Exposure to Conversational UI

This position requires knowledge and passion for data analytics, modeling, and making an impact on the lives of millions of underserved un/underbanked population. Open to students who are willing to work full time for a few months or work part-time during a semester.

These methods include (but not limited to) regression analysis, clustering, outlier detection, novelty detection, decision trees, collaborative filtering, nearest neighbors, support vector machines, ensemble methods and boosting, neural networks and deep learning, feature selection, and factorization methods; 
* Programming skills in Python and R; 
* Ability to work in a dynamic, cross-functional environment, with a strong attention to detail; 
* Effective communication skills and ability to explain complex models in simple terms; 
* Strong relationship building and collaborative skills; 
* Exceptional problem-solving skills.

This role also will require general knowledge in online e-commerce space and startup finance related. You will be also introduced to various partnerships vendors and attend industry events. You will also be responsible for industry research and report on potential opportunities.
Sales is not a major requirement nor is the focus of the role but it's a must-have skillset if you understand the principles and techniques throughout the process. You should have the basic skillsets and knowledge of sale funnels, and cold calling, etc.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Relationship building with potential partnerships

  • Work alongside digital marketing and social media to create effective business development channels which convert
  • Working along side with digital marketing/ social media team
  • Other ad hocs

Must-haves:

  • Positive, professional, high work ethics
  • Strong understanding/interest of fashion retail and e-commerce space
  • Strong understanding of business and digital marketing
  • Executional and punctual
  • Intuitive and poise the day to day interaction skillsets.

We are seeking a Social Media Intern to manage the company's accounts on all social media platforms for visibility and engagement.

As the Social Media Intern, you will support the online voice of our brand ensuring the community is at the heart of everything we do. You will become an expert in brand storytelling and help us communicate our brand value through authentic engagement with clients, consumers, and followers alike. Throughout this experience, you should thrive not only on the responses and exposure you attract but building and connecting an enthusiastic community while representing our brand through the core values.

Job Responsibilities:

  • Assist Founder and team on social media strategy to increase ÀLA.HAUSSE pre-launched brand awareness, grow its followers and drive traffic to its website

    • Build, manage and maintain the company's social media presence on various platforms
    • Create new and innovative social media content that will attract prospective clients and followers
    • Participate in social media discussions and respond to comments on the company
    • Creative writing and content development for blogs and other postings.
    • Engage with key social influencers to form good relationships beneficial to grow the company brand
    • Attend industry and fashion online events or experiences to share on social. Become a part of the core creative team and assist in photoshoots and multimedia projects and PR.

  • Strong knowledge of social media marketing strategies

  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills

  • Ability to write clear and engaging social media content

  • Background in photography and graphic design skills is a bonus.

  • Up to date with the latest trends in social media

What You’ll Do

Manage multiple digital advertising campaign launches, including creative development, continued optimization and planning with clients on a regular basis.
Manage relationships with Omneky's clients and ensure customers understand work completed and results achieved.
Assemble weekly reports that showcase Omneky's work and explain the exceptional value provided through AI driven digital advertising.
Effectively onboard new clients helping them to understand what Omneky provides and how we achieve clients digital marketing goals.
Ensure and maintain overall digital campaign success.
Ability to evaluate processes and continually seek improvement ideas.
Assist with special projects as assigned by Chief Operating Officer and/or Chief Executive Officer.
Some evening and weekend hours are required.

What You’ll Bring

Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Communications, Marketing or related field (and/or equivalent, relevant work experience).
Minimum of 2 years’ experience ranging from college internships to a professional position in SEM Marketing, Digital Campaign Management/Assistance or Customer Service/Client Services - dealing directly with marketing teams, clients and/or Sales Executives.
Experience managing social media advertising and/or display advertising campaigns on Facebook and Google is required. (Additional experience on LinkedIn, Twitter and Snapchat are a plus)
Proven ability to manage complex projects to successful conclusion.
Exhibit exceptional customer service and collaboration skills.
Superior written and verbal communication with the ability to effectively communicate via email and phone with remote colleagues and clients.
Proven ability to establish and maintain strong client partnerships.
Excellent organizational skills including strong attention to detail and ability to present complex information in such a way that all team members understand their tasks at hand.
Strong time management skills including an outstanding ability to work independently and multi-task while operating in an environment of frequently changing priorities and successfully managing the demands of a quickly growing workforce.
Proven ability to independently problem-solve issues quickly and effectively, manage relationships through productive resolution tactics and apply learnings to future situations.
Desire to stay up-to-date on industry trends and impulse to seek opportunities for the larger group to take advantage of those trends in the marketplace.
Must have technical proficiency with Microsoft Office and Internet browser tools. Experience with tools such as Asana, Slack, G-Suite, etc. are a plus.

What we're looking for

Sutra is seeking a talented individual who is truly a self-starter to help our partner success team grow. If you're comfortable speaking with new customers, building relationships and demonstrating how our product can help instructors grow their businesses is essential. Yoga/group fitness instructors already using Sutra is a total plus! We're partnering with some major fitness brands and looking for someone eager and excited to be along for the ride.

The Role

  • Assist our operations team with optmizing our customer experience
  • Implement plans in to optimize day-to-day functions such as customer support and sales operations
  • Assist with weekly reporting across key stakeholders
  • Prepare and maintain operation documents and reports
  • Discover, reach out to new customers, and build relationships with potential partners
  • Engage current users to expand awareness of Sutra, educate, identify new opportunities, and increase referrals
  • Effectively partner and work across marketing, product + customer success teams
  • Shadow our team in meetings and other activities to help you acquire the skills you'll need for your next role

The You

  • Connect. You love meeting new people and sharing Sutra's mission of empowering new and current business owners.
  • Demonstrated ability to explain complex issues clearly
  • Strong experience with Microsoft office
  • Excellent communication skills -- written, verbal, presentation
  • Great at multi-tasking. Able to manage numerous requests and time demands concurrently, while achieving goals.
  • Team player - we're in this together. You will play an integral part of helping our team and work hard to help achieve goals.
  • Organized, self-sufficient and a go-getter. Able to go above and beyond what is expected of you.
  • Currently enrolled in a four-year post-secondary education or work in the fitness/wellness space

The Benefits

  • Weekly workouts with the team

How to Apply

Does this role sound like a good fit? Email us at founders@sutra.fit

  • Include the role's title in your subject line.
  • Send along links that best showcase your relevant experience

About Cast
Cast is a social voting app. We're on a mission to create a safe space to share your honest opinion, and see an instant snapshot of what people really think. We’re turning passive bystanders into active participants in every conversation.

We’re shaking up the social media industry by showing the world what the people really think and not just painting a one-sided narrative. It’s an audacious undertaking, considering we’re going up against some of the biggest and most recognizable companies in the tech world, but we know we have the right team for the task.

Our marketing team is a group of ambitious creatives and connectors who bring unique perspectives to our brand marketing campaigns. Our founders are lifetime entrepreneurs who have always questioned the status quo and worked to improve it exponentially., Our engineering team has a diverse background of experience in startups and established technology companies.

If you want to find out more about what we’re working on at Cast head over to our blog, or download the app and get casting! http://joincast.co/download

Cast Culture
We are a remote-first startup and plan to remain so for the foreseeable future. We have operated this way since our inception and have found great success in this process.

That being said, we still think the best results come from collaboration and working closely with each other. We have a small office in an old factory building in the west end of Toronto that we use when we need to get together for strategy meetings, whiteboard sessions, or company get-togethers. Deep down we still miss the days of working from the office.

We’re still in the early stages of creating Cast so you’ll be working closely with the founding team and your ideas and opinion will have a big impact on inputs and outputs. For that reason we look for individuals who bring unique and honest perspectives to the conversation.

About you
We're looking for a Social Media Maverick who gets excited about being the voice and persona of a company on social media. As a startup in the social media space we need someone who understands the importance of a brand's identity and image.

Has a holistic view of brand design, from the tiny details to the big picture
Has a strong visual POV, grounded in a solid graphic design foundation
Has a intense passion for copywriting and brand voice
Loves great typography, illustration, and motion design
Has a strong understanding of SEO and online advertising
Has a strong understanding of social media, from current trends to platform specific advertising
Someone who thinks for themselves and brings unique perspectives to problems at hand
Values open communication, transparency, and collaboration to constantly make the work better

You don’t need heavy direction. You don’t need daily check-ins. You like open-ended problems, and take ownership of your projects – the elements of a startup environment.

About The Role
Cast Social Media Maverick

Here are some things that you’ll be doing day-to-day:

Work alongside the Director of Communications to handle the Cast company accounts within the Cast App with a focus on creating engaging and newsworthy content.
Work with Director of Communications to craft media pitches, build media lists and conduct media outreach to secure positive news stories about Cast
Work closely with the Marketing team, to create digital content (copy, stills, graphics) across social platforms (Instagram, Snapchat, TikTok, Twitter) with a focus on driving new user adoption and engagement
Social media management - Assist marketing coordinator with managing all social media channels which includes, content creation, engaging with followers and helping to grow our following online
Respond to audience reactions to optimize engagement and community connection
Influencer outreach and communication

Qualifications
2+ years of experience working in digital marketing/communications
Strong public relations and communications skills
Strong organizational, project management, and analytical skills
Exceptional listening, problem-solving, and verbal and written communications skills
Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment with the ability to quickly adapt to change
Excellent communication and presentation skills. You’ll be expected to clearly communicate design decisions to marketing and leadership teams
Perks

Most startups expect employees to burn the candle at both ends. Not Cast. We prioritize flexible schedules and a good work life balance. We don’t count hours worked, we count the quality of work produced. Since we're in the early days, we think that every team member has an impact on the outcomes of Cast. For that reason, we feel that everyone should have meaningful equity in the company. Also, we have cool merch.

Disclaimer

Please note, only qualified candidates selected for an interview will be contacted.

Our Company:
ObjectSecurity is a small company in downtown San Diego (we work out of a coworking space but are currently virtual). We have traditionally focused on cybersecurity but have branched out into data analytics and AI in recent years. Our award-winning, patented security product is OpenPMF, which uses cool models and algorithms to make it easier to author and maintain fine-grained, dynamic access control policies.
We are doing exciting other product developments, including a supply chain risks analysis product which takes an SAP data dump and turns it into a graph DB, and then runs analytics over it to identify risks. Another cool project is an "AI hacker" development, which uses AI to simulate a hacker.

Reverse Engineering Position:
We are looking for an intern with experience working on dynamically analyzing binaries using various tools. We currently have a contract with the Navy to analyze binaries on embedded systems. In part 2 of the application, please list tools that you have used in the past and your prior work.
We are looking for interns for both during the semester and during the summer. We are flexible with start and end dates of the internship and how many hours interns work per week.

Qualifications:
1) Available 8-16 hours per week virtually
2) Prior experience with reverse engineering, using various tools to analyze binaries, and/or extracting firmware off of a device either with an internship/job, from classes, a prior internship or from a research project.

Learning Objectives:
By working directly on software engineering projects hands-on doing front-end and back-end or working on embedded systems, hardware and/or microelectronics, interns will gain valuable experience in the software engineering field and improve upon their computer science skills as evidenced through their weekly projects.

Expectations:
1) Weekdays and hours worked are flexible based on the student's schedule but should be communicated to supervisor at the beginning of each week.
2) We will communicate with the intern virtually via email, Slack and Zoom. A supervisor will meet with the intern at the start of the day to go over the day's tasks and
3) Materials will be provided to interns at the beginning of the day. All interns are expected to push their code at the end of each work day to GitHub
4) If interns are stuck or run into an issue with their code, they are encouraged to reach out to their supervisor, since someone will almost always be available to help.

All of our positions are currently virtual.

  • Advanced proficiency in JavaScript

We looking for football (and other sports) data journalists in the USA!
DoScouting is searching, selecting, preparing, and providing sports data journalists to market leaders. The company has been founded in Denmark, 2016. Since then DoScouting has expanded to different countries, continents.
We are looking the data journalists (different locations) who know various sports (Soccer, American football, Basketball, Ice-hockey, Volleyball, Baseball, Handball, etc.) and are interested to work in this field. You will join a team of professionals, who will help you to become a real data journalist. You will have to attend different sport matches and collect statistical data.
Responsibilities:
• Monitor local leagues.
• Preparation for each match (travel, tickets).
• Communication with a support team.
• Learning new sports.
• Bringing new ideas for the company’s development.
We expect that you:
• You are fluent in English.
• You are over 18 years old.
• You know several sports (rules, teams).
• You are an active and motivated person.
• Any experience with sports analysis is an advantage.
• You are curious, outgoing, and like to solve problems.
• You have managerial skills and you’re able to plan, prepare, and act individually.
Practical details:
• We pay a fee per match plus expenses for your travel and ticket.
• The position is for a freelancer, therefore you work as much as you want.
• We provide you with experienced coaches that will help you to integrate faster into our team.
• At DoScouting we are a team that really enjoys working together. We believe in what we do and make a great effort to create the best work environment.
If you are interested to join our team don’t hesitate and contact us now by email or filling out an application directly on our website. https://www.doscouting.com

Please contact us ONLY THROUGH WEBSITE

Analytical Tools and Solutions (ATS) is responsible for the quantitative models and analytical tools used in the rating process and across MIS. ATS also serves as an innovation hub for MIS, and helps coordinate and drive technology innovation across the firm. Within ATS, the Innovation & Data Science (IDS) group channels innovation ideas to build innovation strategies and performs MIS technology innovation activities to develop advanced capabilities in data processing and AI/ML. IDS partners with groups across MIS to drive innovation, helping them use new tools or ways of thinking to generate ideas, share information, or solve problems. This helps the business make better decisions by leveraging the latest advances in enabling and emerging technologies.

In support of our drive for continued innovation within MIS, we recently created a MIS Blockchain Center for Enablement (C4E) team within IDS to focus on translating blockchain and crypto-assets related business needs to define use cases and requirements, support blockchain analytical and engineering teams to develop production grade applications as well as build required technology infrastructure and increase dialog with institutional enterprises and blockchain service providers for potential opportunities to apply blockchain technology. This illustrates our commitment to invest with intent to grow our existing alignment of talent and business needs in a manner which advances progress of MIS’ strategic initiatives.

The Crypto-asset Analyst will join our Blockchain C4E team to leverage their credit and analytic acumen, while engaging with senior leadership team, rating groups, credit specialists and engineering teams within Moody’s organization. You will be a key member of the IDS group focusing on a broad range of activities to identify, develop and implement new blockchain and crypto-asset opportunities for MIS. You will be part of a team of individuals responsible for supporting successful project deliveries for our C4E. The role also includes advocating for operational and process changes to move towards a more data driven organizational paradigm.

The Duties Of Crypto-asset Analyst Include
Manage and maintain deep understanding of the financial markets and the potential wide-reaching impact of Decentralized Finance (DeFi) on existing ecosystem
Perform back-testing of assessment framework(s) developed by Blockchain C4E using market data to analyze crypto-assets and other related products;provide detailed feedback for further refinement of risk factors
Develop deep understanding and working knowledge of blockchain and crypto-assets, NFTs and other crypto-assets
Stay up-to-date on development within the industry and perform risk analysis of DeFi (blockchain) protocols, and other features
Develop and maintain models for projections on the general market size and applications, including custody, financing, market structure, and payments
Cultivate relationships with analysts across all levels of MIS rating groups to categorize conventional credit analysis methodology and identify ways to integrate with crypto-asset rating framework
Participate in special blockchain and crypto-asset related projects to advance the broader organization’s strategic objectives, which include solidifying Moody’s market position, enhancing operations, developing talent, and growing the business
Scan the market and, support research and training initiatives to ensure MIS has a flow of blockchain related innovative ideas to help transform the business
Provide forward-looking views with a high degree of transparency to MIS Senior Leadership Team and other stakeholders

Support business requirements activities by providing end-to-end analysis for product and initiatives with respect to data requirements, data flows, data modeling, workflow context and design, and user interface designs within and across Moody's systems
Collaborate with business partners and engineering teams to design experiments to test hypothesis and help with idea generation and refinement
Support in developing ratings assessment framework to identify risks and merits of blockchain and crypto-assets, with a focus on protocols, smart contracts, token and node design
Contribute to the development of Etha's’ multi-year strategy and goal
Potential for relocation or remote work

Qualifications
Minimum bachelor’s degree in degree in Business Administration, Economics, Financial Engineering, or a closely related field. Master’s degree, MBA, CFA or similar designations a plus
5+ years of progressively responsible credit rating analysis related experience
Intermediate understanding of blockchain and crypto-asset industry, especially DeFi
Strong Excel skills for modeling and ability to perform cash flow analysis or use other analytical tools. Knowledge of SQL is preferred
Experience evaluating new technologies affecting infrastructure and working with both investment grade and speculative grade issuers
Experience with project development life cycle, preferably within banking & capital markets environment, or leading crypto startups

Nice To Have (one Or More Of The Following)
Interest and passion for designing blockchain based solutions as well as developing crypto-asset assessment frameworks Good written and oral communication skills, as well as strong analytic, problem solving and decision-making skills. Strong analytical orientation Practical experience with blockchain and crypto-assets Strong understanding of crypto-asset and DeFi market dynamics Experience in market or competitive intelligence, business operations, data visualization tools and/or data warehouse development Knowledge of innovative technical concepts including Machine Learning, AI, etc.

About Meter:
Meter is developing next-generation volumetric imaging technology. We are building a machine that can see inside of anything and cloud-based software for processing the complex, volumetric data that the machine produces. Our technology will give engineers, designers, and eventually medical practitioners more confidence in their processes and lower the barrier to high quality imaging and inspection tools.

Our team of engineers includes world-class researchers, industrial designers, PhDs, founders of successful startups, and zero egos. We are backed by some of the top venture capital funds and angel investors in Silicon Valley and beyond. The company is headquartered in Cambridge, MA and has an office in San Francisco, CA.

The Role:
We’re looking for co-ops to join our team in both our Boston and San Francisco offices. At Meter, we make no distinction between full time team members and co-ops, we provide real world engineering training with students working directly alongside our senior engineers. We have open roles on our frontend, backend, and full stack software teams - all with access to cutting edge innovative technologies, mentorship, competitive pay, professional development and social engagement opportunities.

What will you do?

  • Disrupt the multi-billion dollar industrial inspection market
  • Define and develop technical approaches to data-heavy problems
  • Write code to operate everything from embedded electronics to cloud based GPU clusters
  • Analyze the data you gather to make design improvements and determine final go-to-market specifications.
  • Communicate your results to the rest of the team on a regular basis

You:

  • Enjoy working independently as well as collaboratively
  • Have excellent technical communication skills
  • Are familiar with Python, C++, and/or JavaScript
  • Are comfortable developing experiments and benchmarking protocols
  • Can propose new solutions to complex problems and quickly develop functioning prototypes
  • Have a strong grasp of linear algebra and can think computationally about data processing problems

Bonus points for

  • Experience modeling physical and optical systems
  • Experience in computer vision, imaging, and image processing
  • Familiarity with high performance computing, GPU programming, heterogeneous computing
  • Familiarity with machine and deep learning methods
  • A portfolio of your past work you can share

This is a full time co-op position for Spring 2022.

Meter offers both competitive cash and equity compensation. We have a generous vacation policy as well as paid parental leave, health, dental, vision, retirement and commuter benefits.

In keeping with our beliefs and goals, no employee or applicant will face discrimination or harassment based on: race, color, ancestry, national origin, religion, age, gender, marital domestic partner status, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability status, or veteran status. Above and beyond discrimination or harassment based on “protected categories,” Meter also strives to prevent other, subtler forms of inappropriate behavior from ever gaining a foothold in our company. Whether blatant or hidden, barriers to success have no place at Meter.

Reach out if you want to be a part of what we are building.

The Company

Camus Energy was founded in 2019 in the San Francisco Bay area. We have deep experience designing and operating distributed systems, and a passion for combating climate change. From pioneering work at Google, SpaceX, and Uber, we bring expertise in massively parallel cloud computing, high-scale real-time analytics, and high-reliability computing.

We work on building software for the grid. The challenges faced by grid operators in an evolving energy landscape are unique. The existing grid is one of humanity’s largest machines, and keeping it running safely and smoothly is critical to modern life. But as it becomes smarter, more connected, and more dynamic, we can draw lessons from other industries about how to manage the challenges of scale and reliability for an effective energy transition.

We founded Camus Energy to lend our software engineering skills to address climate change. We are committed to accelerating the adoption of renewable energy and the reduction of carbon emissions from the energy grid.

We believe that we can combine our desire to impact the world with our technical expertise to bring about positive change. And we are going to have fun doing it.

The Role

Camus needs great engineers. You will contribute in all aspects of product and infrastructure development, including: requirements gathering, software development, testing, documentation, training, implementation, and ongoing support and maintenance. We are creating the grid management systems of the future using the full set of modern, scalable tools and techniques. So, knowing how to work with existing open source software and services can have as important a role as new software development.

Camus is a fast moving environment. You will be tasked with solving various problems over time. You will work in an agile development environment, moving quickly from customer requirements to working systems and applications.

Communication is paramount at Camus. You will be comfortable talking to customers, demoing your work in front of small audiences. You speak fluent English.

Responsibilities

  • Develop, maintain and test our next generation cloud platform
  • Collaborate with a small team of developers in a fast-paced agile environment
  • Engage with engineers, product managers, and customers for feedback, feature requests, and solutions

Minimum Qualifications

  • BA/BS or equivalent experience in related field
  • Software development experience in one or more general purpose programming languages.
  • Experience working with two or more from the following: web application development, Unix/Linux environments, mobile application development, distributed and parallel systems, machine learning, information retrieval, natural language processing, networking, developing large software systems, and/or security software development.
  • Working proficiency and communication skills in verbal and written English.

Bonus

  • Go or Python
  • Vue
  • Stream Processing
  • Influx DB
  • Knowledge of SQL, relational database concepts
  • GIS

Dapi is a financial technology infrastructure provider that allows businesses to accept and initiate bank transfers at nearly zero fees. We work to remove intermediaries thereby allowing our customers to deliver alternative payment solutions to their end-users. We are building a new financial infrastructure that will enable every company to offer its own embedded financial services. Within one year of our launch, we have managed to attract investments from Y Combinator, Pioneer Fund, and other notable VC funds. Read more about us in TechCrunch and Crunchbase.

Dapi is looking for a VP of Engineering to help Dapi scale globally. You will be in charge of introducing new departments and scaling the engineering team to be able to handle the demands of fast-paced growth. Dapi is growing to support hundreds of banks across the world, millions in transaction volume all while maintaining a great customer experience. We are seeking an experienced VP of Engineering who will build, grow, and lead engineers across multiple product teams and platforms. In this role, you’ll bring your operational leadership, technical expertise, and proven people development skills to bear on strategic decisions about our technical ecosystem, product roadmap, and engineering culture. You will bring deep expertise in implementing development processes to drive team execution and meet business goals. You will be a key member of the Technology leadership team. This role will be remote, and the ideal candidate can be based anywhere in the US.

Responsibilities

  • Create a high-performance culture that promotes achievement and is geared toward employee retention and productivity.
  • Create a technology plan that allows engineers to make amazing decisions while scaling up, and releasing new features.
  • Ensure our practices (e.g. CI/CD, code reviews, QA technology, etc) are ready for scaling and constantly evaluate the tech stack for our evolving business needs.
  • Use best in class tools for tooling, logging, CI/CD, QA, etc, build and document processes
  • Grow the team; optimize our recruiting process and hire across all backgrounds, all levels of seniority & specialist technical domains.
  • Own the engineering infrastructure and SaaS budget. Continue building our tech ops competency for efficiency, reliability, scale, and security.
  • As a VP of Engineering you will be in charge of support, the different engineering departments, work closely with Product and Sales and you will report to the CTO & CEO.
  • Maintain and shorten iteration cycles in the face of increasing scale and complexity.
  • Conduct and perform regular performance reviews for the engineering team.

Qualifications

  • 5+ years managing engineering teams
  • 5+ years software engineering experience developing web and API applications, with a preference for enterprise SaaS
  • Experienced working remotely
  • Successfully scaled an engineering organization from a seed-stage company to a Series C level company
  • Highly technical with expertise in infrastructure, architecture, mobile development, and DevOps
  • Familiarity with Agile Methodologies and Cloud deployed software (Azure is preferred)
  • Experience leading and/or developing enterprise systems and applications at scale
  • Experience managing large teams with next line managers/directors
  • Experienced at organizing agile software teams to deliver high-quality software
  • Operate with empathy and strive to cultivate a work environment that is both supportive and challenging
  • Passionate about helping engineers develop new skills and advance in their careers
  • Strong verbal and written communication, collaboration, and documentation skills
  • You are a lifelong learner and passionate about learning new things and taking on new challenges
  • Highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to work autonomously with minimal direction

This individual must be able to generate unique content (including graphics) and publish it in an evidence-based, strategic manner. This person will analyze and thoroughly understand the profile of our users and will work to appeal to those audiences on the appropriate visual and audio social platforms. The social media intern will curate and secure creators to sponsor who will promote Fourplay to their niche audiences across "alt" platforms such Reddit, Twitch, Discord etc., in addition to finding creators to sponsor on larger and more mainstream platforms such as Instagram, TikTok, Twitter, Apple/Spotify Podcasts, etc. The social media intern will also improve SEO and web traffic. This role requires a person who is resourceful and scrappy. It is especially important that this person has interest working with a pre-seed start up. This person thinks outside the box and considers themselves a “hacker,” of sorts.

Requirements:

1) Have an immersive understanding of the Fourplay brand

2) Be at least 20 years old

3) Live in NYC

4) Be a highly social individual who has interest in growing a startup

We’re looking for a User Analysis intern. In this role, you’ll help Fourplay understand the profile of existing users and potential users alike. You will identify how these individuals view the brand, view themselves, and view dating. You will directly interact with existing users to obtain feedback about their in-app an off-app experiences. You will also survey communities of desired future users. Using your analysis and projections, Fourplay will implement new product design and customer acquisition strategies.

Requirements: Pursuing a bachelors degree in the field of advertising, marketing, communications, psychology, or sociology; Detail oriented; Proficient in Excel; Comfortable with outreach.

About Us

Taonga is an early-stage tech startup in the privacy and security space. We believe people deserve more control and transparency over who can access their personal information, like their passport, tax documents or will. We're building a privacy-by-design digital vault that prioritizes the customers ability to store, manage and share their data easily.

We are currently a bootstrapped startup, have a strong community of enthusiastic beta users and have a lot of exciting features to work on. We’re on a mission to build a better tomorrow and let people take back control of their personal documents. Come join us!

Why This Role Is Exciting

We’re looking for a Growth Intern to join the team and build and execute on growth and sales for Taonga. You will have a direct impact on shaping our sales strategy, work directly with the founder and marketing teams, and help define our company culture.

In this role, you will:

  • Set up a sales engine using a series of tools (LinkedIn Sales Navigator, Outreach/SalesLoft, Hubspot, Gong and others)
  • Work closely with the Marketing team to make sure their efforts are aligned with our goal to increase brand awareness, attract and capture qualified leads
  • Work closely with the founder to make sure their processes (outreach and deal closing) are optimized and yield the best potential results
  • Select, set up and manage any consultants, agencies or tools aimed at generating leads when needed
  • Create or work with partners to create and optimize paid ads
  • Identify and execute marketing projects to help Taonga keep growing
  • Evaluate the performance of your efforts on a regular basis, creating insight reports to share with the team
  • Conduct internal and external research about Taonga’s client characteristics and target audience behaviour, demographics, and interests, continuously iterate

A good applicant has:

Social Media experience - a strong interest and understanding of how Social Media works
Strategy intrigue - a desire to dive into numbers, analyze what is and isn’t working, and build a strategy to increase awareness and share our story
Strong communicator - we are a remote-first company and rely on clear communication to build a strong company culture and product
Mentorship mindset - we believe in putting ego aside, and creating a strong culture that allows mentorship across all members
Customer obsession - we value customer feedback and strive to understand customer needs as we keep building
Comfort with ambiguity - we are in beta, and expect to evolve our product roadmap and GTM strategies over the year

Interview Process

We shall contact applicants on a rolling basis starting

Step 1: Video call with Aashni Shah, CEO
Step 2: Reference Check
Step 3: Offer
Step 4: Join the team and start making an impact!

Our commitment to equity, inclusion and diversity

Our founder, Aashni, is on a personal mission to build a better tomorrow. One of her priorities is to ensure Taonga embraces diversity and treats all employees and job applicants equally. Every decision is based on merit, qualifications, and talent. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

If you like to work on interesting problems, enjoy making an impact and love programming, we think you’d be really happy here! Come say hello!

description:
Who we are

Social media has the ability to touch hearts, open minds, and influence what we buy, eat, and do. But today, marketing a product on platforms such as TikTok, Instagram, and Youtube is done by “gut feel” and its effectiveness is not adequately measured and optimized. That’s why Prune.ai exists: to help brands and influencers grow their business on social media by leveraging the power of data and algorithms. As a market leader in machine learning applied to influencer marketing, we get people excited to grow their earnings and return on marketing spend, all while saving 10x the time. Our team is a diverse crew that has one thing in common: our love for innovative thinking. If you’re passionate about transforming the future of social media marketing with data and algorithms, you’re just our type.

Job Description

  • Drive forward new projects related to digital marketing, e.g. in Content Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Search Engine Optimisation.
  • Identify and develop opportunities to grow user base and revenue
  • Participate regularly in brainstorming sessions for the development of new customer acquisition channels
  • Test, monitor, and analyze marketing efforts, providing insights and recommendations for future A/B experiments

How you benefit

  • A chance to flex your digital marketing muscles in a fast-paced, real-world environment
  • A chance to learn about the fast-growing influencer marketing & artificial intelligence software space
  • A unique opportunity to work with the CEO directly
  • Flexible hours and vacation policy
  • An open-minded company culture with respect for innovative thinking
  • Diverse team optimized for remote work

Qualifications

  • Familiarity with digital marketing software and social media platforms
  • Demonstrated capacity to communicate complex, large-scale concepts clearly and simply
  • Willingness to learn the latest digital marketing trends and techniques
  • A hands-on executer and fast learner
  • Open-minded, doesn’t jump to conclusions, asks good questions
  • Strong communication skills, isn’t afraid to ask questions, solve problems in a creative way, and bring their own ideas and viewpoints to the table.
  • Strong quantitative or analytical ability. You must be able to think quantitatively, even if you have never taken math or CS class in your life. (It won’t disqualify you if you haven’t.)
  • Bonus: Current enrollment in an undergraduate course for a quantitative field, including quantitative marketing, math, computer science, economics, finance, and accounting

This is a paid internship role. You must be able to commit a minimum of 15-20 hours per week and a min of 3 months

position: Web Development Intern – Work on new challenges while learning new skills
description:
Who we are.

Part consulting group; part startup accelerator we are a startup of startups. Our goal is to build a team that can quickly find the valuation of any idea and help bring it to market in an efficient low-cost manner. This may include software development, UX/UI design, marketing or a number of other skills. Whether it's a client company or an internal idea we have what it takes to make it successful.

We’re looking for a co-founder to join the team and lead a team of senior developers and interns, help with product development and become part of the face of the company.

The ideal candidate is an experienced engineer who is comfortable in both large and small environments. Someone who understands leadership and organizational philosophy and most importantly is still hungry to build companies. So far it's been a fun idea and we're optimistic about success across multiple areas.

Benefits of working with us:
• Enhance your skillset and knowledge
• Opportunity to learn about many different verticals
• Feel empowered and change things - We value ideas and suggestions
• Work in an inclusive culture where transparency, creativity, accountability and ownership are encouraged
• Freedom to take out-of-the-box approach
• Support and resources to grow into a senior management position
• Flat Organization structure
• Exposure to startup challenges

Who you Are
• People tell you that you have a high attention to detail
• You are a bottom-up thinker, and are wholly unsatisfied with a functional solution that you do not understand
• You write clean, readable, testable and maintainable code
• You love working with other people, and people love working with you

Skills

• Front end development experience, using at least one major client side framework (React, Angular, Vue, etc)
• API development experience, using at least one major server side framework (Django, Rails, Node/Express, etc.)
• Experience using a variety of database technologies (SQL, NoSQL, key-value stores, etc.), and familiar with the tradeoffs and use cases for each

Bonus Skills
• Familiarity with React Native, Firebase/Firestore, GraphQL/Apollo, Docker/Kubernetes, and/or streaming content analytics would be considered a strong plus
• You have solid software engineering fundamentals:
o You understand unit/integration/system testing, and have a practical understanding of when each is necessary
o You have good software design skills, and know how to apply separation of concerns, inversion of control, dependency injection, etc.

Your main objectives will be the design and implementation of a deep-learning based framework that uses mobile sensor data to perform user-authentication. Apart from the raw sensor data itself, certain high-level aspects related to the user like the walking patterns, phone handling, daily life events, etc. would help identify the real user of the device. Depending on the duration of the internship, you might additionally have the opportunity to gain a first-hand experience of deploying the framework you develop, on a device (mobile phone) and evaluate real-time performance. Zighra transforms mobile sensor data into human-relatable intelligence, and hence this project sits at the heart of its technology.

At Zighra, we're creating something new, something connected, and something with global impact. Zighra has been granted several patents in the sensor based authentication space with over 100+ citations from organizations like Google, Paypal ,Square, IBM, MS, Intel, Mastercard, Blackberry and Alibaba among others. We're a small team with big goals.

As a deep learning intern on the Zighra team, you will push the boundaries of marketing AI, machine learning, sensors and UX. If you are looking to tackle big problems alongside some of the most dynamic, talented people you've ever worked with? Join us!

BERKELEY PHARMA TECH FELLOWSHIP

Berkeley Pharma Tech is looking for a dynamic, enthusiastic, mission-oriented scientific writer with relevant prior experience with grant writing for the National Institute of Health. If you are looking for a chance to expand your passion for writing and gain insight into the biotech industry, this is an experience you have been waiting for.

Number of positions available: 1
Salary: Equity compensation
Duration: August 25, 2021 to August 25, 2022
Location: Work from home. You must reside in the U.S.
Hours: 15 hours per week

Benefits:

  • Earn equity in a start-up
  • Training is provided
  • Flexible work schedule
  • Remote work
  • Earn college credit according to your university’s requirements
  • Obtain a letter of recommendation at the end of the work cycle
  • Gain experience!

Fellowship Description:

  • You will be working collaboratively with the Biomedical Research team in order to best support and obtain funding for various research projects.
  • You will be working closely and reporting to the director.
  • You will be responsible for producing the highest quality written scientific documents for funding applications, including researching, writing, editing, and proofreading grant proposals.

The preferred candidate would:

  • have or be currently pursuing a Master’s or a Ph.D. degree in Molecular and Cell Biology, life or health sciences
  • Have at least a year of previous experience with grant writing
  • Capable of interpreting and explaining complex information
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • A very high standard of written English is required to communicate effectively and professionally
  • Breadth of research interest and eagerness to learn about new areas and developments in medicine with potential to improve people’s lives.
  • Significant working knowledge and experience in the use of MS Word, Outlook and PowerPoint
  • Some experience conducting research on PubMed
  • Extremely strong time management skills

Why Berkeley Pharma Tech?
At Berkeley Pharma Tech, we celebrate diversity of thought and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all our people. We believe that a culture of empowerment and diversity is vital to our continued innovation and success.

We need determined individuals to help make this happen. We work in small, agile teams, tackle the big issues, raise education standards, and deliver innovative solutions to learners and researchers.

To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter outlining your motivations for being interested in this fellowship. We will consider applications on a rolling basis until the position is filled.

Estee Foroozan, HR Team Leader, esteeforoozan.bpt@gmail.com

About Berkeley Pharma Tech
Berkeley Pharma tech is a biotechnology incubator. Established in 2019, our start-up is dedicated to finding the next big scientific ideas upon which innovations are built. We are proud to be a part of the biotechnology ecosystem in Silicon Valley. We aim to guide young scientists and entrepreneurs in the search for novel medical solutions. Our fellows will take part in hands-on projects that result in the spinning out of companies, and ultimately, the creation of innovative medicine and medical devices to improve the quality of life.

position: Artist-in-residence - The Making Of A Metaverse Internship
description:
The Verse Is An Engine For The Development Of Digital Experiences That Shift Health & Wellbeing.
Interested in the power of art to heal and transform, games for wellbeing/health? Do you want to build a “metaverse”? We are looking for you! TheVerse is building digital experiences (art and games) that improve wellbeing. Digital experiences that explore calm focus, equanimity, compassion, prosociality/tend and befriend, empathy taking, and perspectivising. We believe that art and games have great potential to improve our wellbeing/health practices.

  • TheVerse is looking for bold and creative artists with a passion for community development/building community, and creating engaging experiences/conversations thru art around health, wellbeing, and consciousness.
  • We are “building in the open”! We engage with our community by telling what we are doing, why we are doing it, and sharing our process and projects. By building in the open, we develop a great understanding of community!

The Verse seeks to...

  • Support individuals at the cutting edge of their fields, whose art explores transformation.
  • Provide The Verse community with the opportunity for exploration and experimentation.
  • Bring artists and thinkers into a dynamic community of local, national, and international artists, thinkers, and builders: an ecosystem for the development of digital experiences that shift health and consciousness.
  • Berkeley/Santa Barbara. Virtual internship - Ok.

We have three areas of focus: art, gaming,and education.

  • Art - collecting, crowdsourcing, curating art around transformational themes (awe, prosociality - aka “tend and befriend”, perspective taking, empathy, consciousness, transformation, psychedelics)
  • Positive Gaming - building game mechanics that gamify mindfulness, contemplation, and prosociality. Building tool sets that measure the impact of our game mechanics on wellbeing, mental health, and consciousness. Some of our games @ https://bit.ly/3yaw3kQ.
  • Education - an emergent model of learning and action based around the central themes of systems, play and design. [Gaming Literacy] Our distributed structure enables The Verse to organize around smaller, focused nodes of interest that incubate experimental initiatives, while the wider network develops and organizes activities that have a broader scope.

We are looking for candidates that are interested in art, co-creation, community creation, gaming, games for change/health/wellbeing/, gamification, Transformative Technology, XR (Virtual Reality/Augmented Reality), game design/development, health and wellbeing, games for change, positive psychology, neuroscience, Buddhism, and psychedelics.

What will you get working with TheVerse?

  • Opportunity: Experience building impact games. Be part of building a MetaVerse.
  • Visionary Product: Be part of the team that is building an awe-inspiring gamified tool that changes lives.
  • Access: TheVerse is working with a visionary group of transformative technology thinkers, innovators, entrepreneurs, gamers, neuroscientists, clinicals, academics, and artists who want to change the world.
  • Training: Opportunity to work on a diverse range of projects (game dev, data analytics, product development, biz development, and community building).
  • References/Recommendation

Please include your resume, and tell us what you think is interesting about The Verse! If you do not hear from us, please be patient – we are growing rapidly. Please include your resume, and tell us what you think is interesting about The Verse! If you do not hear from us, please be patient – we are growing rapidly. Info about our projects @ https://bit.ly/3BaG5Vd.

Contact bst@versebuilding.com for more info and/or with any questions! We are always interested in connecting with the right people..

Thanks.
Ben Simon-Thomas
Co-Founder

TheVerse team is 20+ entrepreneurs, artists, and game developers with experiences and expertise (MAs & PhDs) in gaming, world building, metaverses, build in the open, community development, health & wellbeing.

  • Ben Simon-Thomas - Founder/CEO. Buddhist-leaning entrepreneur and ecosystem developer. Founded startups in the 3D space (SoundFit: 3D Scanning & ODMS: parts-on-demand), social commerce (GroupGain), worked in health-care startups and life style modification businesses (PMRI). MA in Buddhist psychology, degrees in Religious Philosophy and Language.
  • Anshul Pendse - Experience Design/PhD. Anshul is a world-builder, experience designer and creative technologist. With a background in feature film VFX, computer animation, interactive media and game design, Anshul builds immersive, multi-sensory virtual worlds that elicit the sense of heightened awareness, mindfulness and altered states of consciousness.

  • Pre and Post game measurement.
  • Data collection/data analysis.

The Verse is a network that explores transformation and growth. Guided by our "verse building in the open" mantra, we cultivate an ecology of practices to reimagine a shift in consciousness. We have three areas of focus: art, gaming,and education.

  • Art - collecting, crowdsourcing, curating art around transformational themes (awe, prosociality - aka “tend and befriend”, perspective taking, empathy, consciousness, transformation, psychedelics)
  • Positive Gaming - building game mechanics that gamify mindfulness, contemplation, and prosociality. Building tool sets that measure the impact of our game mechanics on wellbeing, mental health, and consciousness. Some of our games @ https://bit.ly/3yaw3kQ.
  • Education - an emergent model of learning and action based around the central themes of systems, play and design. [Gaming Literacy] Our distributed structure enables The Verse to organize around smaller, focused nodes of interest that incubate experimental initiatives, while the wider network develops and organizes activities that have a broader scope.

We are looking for candidates that are interested in gaming, games for change/health/wellbeing/, gamification, Transformative Technology, XR (Virtual Reality/Augmented Reality), game design/development, health and wellbeing, data analytics/big data, games for change, positive psychology, neuroscience, Buddhism, psychedelics, or growth hacking.

What will you get working with TheVerse?

  • Opportunity: Experience building impact games. Be part of building a MetaVerse.
  • Visionary Product: Be part of the team that is building an awe-inspiring gamified tool that changes lives.
  • Access: TheVerse is working with a visionary group of transformative technology thinkers, innovators, entrepreneurs, gamers, neuroscientists, clinicals, academics, and artists who want to change the world.
  • Training: Opportunity to work on a diverse range of projects (game dev, data analytics, product development, biz development, and community building).
  • References/Recommendation

Please include your resume, and tell us what you think is interesting about The Verse! If you do not hear from us, please be patient – we are growing rapidly. Please include your resume, and tell us what you think is interesting about The Verse! If you do not hear from us, please be patient – we are growing rapidly. Info about our projects @ https://bit.ly/3BaG5Vd.

Contact info@w3ll.xyz for more info and/or with any questions! We are always interested in connecting with the right people..

Thanks.
Ben Simon-Thomas
Co-Founder

TheVerse team is 20+ entrepreneurs, artists, and game developers with experiences and expertise (MAs & PhDs) in gaming, world building, metaverses, build in the open, community development, health & wellbeing.

  • Ben Simon-Thomas - Founder/CEO. Buddhist-leaning entrepreneur and ecosystem developer. Founded startups in the 3D space (SoundFit: 3D Scanning & ODMS: parts-on-demand), social commerce (GroupGain), worked in health-care startups and life style modification businesses (PMRI). MA in Buddhist psychology, degrees in Religious Philosophy and Language.
  • Anshul Pendse - Experience Design/PhD. Anshul is a world-builder, experience designer and creative technologist. With a background in feature film VFX, computer animation, interactive media and game design, Anshul builds immersive, multi-sensory virtual worlds that elicit the sense of heightened awareness, mindfulness and altered states of consciousness.

Jetzy is looking for an energetic, curious, and driven Human Resources Intern. This role is focused on talent acquisition and performance management. HR Intern will be involved in recruiting new talent, coordinating with management and different functional areas to assign new talent to various projects and be a resource for new hires for any information and all HR related issues. HR interns will play a key role in contributing to the growth of the Jetzy team. This is an incredible opportunity to be on the ground with a startup from the inception of the product and gain an in-depth entrepreneurial skill set.

Responsibilities

-Develop an understanding of Jetzy’s culture and possess the ability to communicate the culture to prospective employees/interns

-Assist in the recruitment process — updating the candidate’s information in our applicant tracking system, pre-screening candidates, and conducting interviews

-Assist in the distribution and delivery of recruiting materials

-Provide knowledge and insight on different HR tasks and duties

-Assist and coordinate with other team members to complete daily tasks

-Must be an active user on the Jetzy app (post, like, and comment on a daily basis)

The Digital Marketing/Social Media Intern will help spearhead all digital and social media efforts under the guidance of our Director of Media & Strategy. You will be responsible for helping to create and implement a strategy to increase our digital footprint and social media community. This position provides an excellent opportunity to learn firsthand how to participate in various stages of print and online marketing.

Responsibilities

-Develop digital and social media campaigns for the promotion of Jetzy
-Help to develop viral and buzz marketing strategies to generate brand awareness
-Assist in the creation of e-mail campaigns and online promotion
-Knowledge of Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn and analyzing data from these platforms
-Find relevant travel, lifestyle, food, fashion & other similar forums, blogs, and interest groups to post about Jetzy
-Assist in the distribution or delivery of marketing materials
-Assist with fulfillment of marketing offers
-Create, schedule, and share event advertisement
-Share company photos, posts, videos on different online platforms

Requirements

-Knowledge of media production, communication, and dissemination techniques and methods
-Strong computer skills and a basic understanding of the Microsoft Suite, Google Suite, and social media
-Excellent communication skills in written and oral
-Creativity, ambition, and a strong work ethic
-Strong organizational skills
-Ability to work independently and in a team environment
-Ability to multi-task in a fast paced environment and act with a sense of urgency
-Superior problem-solving skills - must be resourceful and creative with solutions
-Must be available to start within a week a two

About Jetzy
Jetzy is a social media/tech start-up that is designing the world’s first user-to-user social networking app for travelers. The app connects travelers with other travelers and locals in their immediate area and provides free travel rewards to users simply for using the app.

The app allows the user to create profiles on which they identify their interests from a number of different filters--such as foodies, wine-os, beach bums, hikers, and many more! Travelers looking for local, expert advice can reach out to other users who have identified themselves according to their interests, ensuring the best travel experience possible.

Users also have the opportunity to earn a variety of rewards via the app’s reward program. As people use and engage with the app--posting pictures, chatting with friends, checking in at locations--they earn and can accumulate points that they can redeem for a number of our incredible rewards. From spa vouchers, paddleboard lessons, dinners for two, hotel stays, and plane tickets to all-expenses-paid trips to international destinations, we are offering an endless number of enviable rewards users can earn for free!

The co-founders in this venture are experts in their respective fields, with over twenty years of experience between the two. Ty Sawyer is a multi-award winning travel media expert, content engagement specialist, editor, writer, photographer and a proven entrepreneur. He is an expert commentator on the Travel Channel, has hosted a popular travel-based TV show, consulted as a media and branding specialist for ultra high-end media start-ups, numerous tourism boards, and founded a content-driven digital application technology company. Shama Zehra is a serial entrepreneur and has built several successful businesses in technology, financial services, and fashion space. An alum of Goldman Sachs and Morgan Stanley, Shama’s entrepreneurial vision and success has been the subject of cover stories on Forbes, Crain's, and several other publications.

Read more about the company and app at https://www.jetzyapp.com/.

The Sales & Partnerships Intern is responsible for coordinating with colleges & universities, corporations, travel, and other relevant institutions with the goal of connecting and forming a partnership with them. The Intern will be dealing with the designated departments to develop these partnerships. Interns will build relationships and consult with strategic partners and communicate the benefits of Jetzy and how Jetzy can provide a solution for their employees and student body for networking and traveling.

Through this position, the candidate can get involved in the core business development and help Jetzy develop institutional partnerships. Candidates will have exposure to various senior-level executives in multiple industries, build leadership skills, enhance their network, and build entrepreneurial skills. This position is an opportunity that will help you gain experience working in a fast-paced tech startup/social media company and learn hands-on experience in its operations. We have both full-time and remote/part-time assignment opportunities available. Success in this position requires exceptional consultative and people skills, with an ability to thrive in a dynamic, team-focused environment.
*This is a commission based role. There is no base salary"

Responsibilities

-Build and execute brand partnership strategies for different colleges & universities and corporations worldwide
-Presentations to prospective business partners
-Ensure that there is a seamless process for providing pre & post partnership and dedicated customer service support to the partners

Requirements

-Professional demeanor
-Ability to work independently and in a team environment
-Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment and act with a sense of urgency
-Problem-solving skills - must be resourceful and creative with solutions
-Must be available to start within a week or two

description:
Are you a social media connoisseur? Have you mastered tik tok? Do you thrive on Instagram? Do you LOVE making fun graphics or creative videos?

We're looking for a social media and marketing intern who can roll up his/her sleeves to promote Real Food Bar.

We embrace authentic experiences in a fun and casual voice. We're looking for someone who enjoys advocating for brands and causes they love. This person thrives on helping their friends find the best products that will improve their life.

We are a fast growing startup in consumer product goods. We're at a point where we need help from you to spread the love of REAL FOOD.

*Things you will focus on: *

  • Identify trends and implement best practices from data
  • Utilize tools that increase efficiency - Later.com for social media posting
  • Ability to take stunning photos or videos
  • Photoshop, Adobe XD and Adobe Final Cut Pro or other video editing experience
  • Passion for the brand and mission
  • Humor - you love using gifs, posting photos of dogs and are up on the lastest trends
  • Creativity with trending topics to get the most engagement with brand voice
  • Organize brand partnerships - giveaways with likeminded brands to our key demographic audience

Expectations:
This is an unpaid internship at approximately 20 hours per week. We prefer candidates close to Austin, TX who would be available for meeting occassionally in person or doing local fitness events, but are open to remote candidates. Our team is made up of individuals across the world.

*About us: *

Real Food Bars are portable snack bars that are rich in macronutrients for on-the-go nutrition. We make delicious snackable and shelf stable bars from real food. Frustrated that on-the-go lifestyles often result in food left to spoil at home, we've partners with farmers across the United States to rescue surplus produce and then lock in nutrition from a unique air drying technology so that you can have a delicious food bar with nut butters, plant-based protein and veggies in one.

*Our Mission: *
Our mission is to equip people with real food snacks that are more than just a snack - they're better for you, better for the plant and help you get more out of life. We're committed to nutrient-rich and plant-based ingredients through a sustainably sourced supply chain that directly tackles food waste.

ZAKKI is a social startup focusing on creating an inclusive community for the elderly and people with disabilities. Our mission is to facilitate alms and donations collection and distribution to help the elderly and people with disabilities who work in the informal sector to get better livelihood through micro-business management, giving them greater market exposure.

Our Minimum Viable Product (MVP) can be found on https://www.zakki.org.

Currently, we are still redesigning ZAKKI fully function product. We are expecting to develop the ZAKKI fully function product in the upcoming years.

And, we are also developing a ramification project; reporting platforms of sexual misconduct (sexual harassment, sexual assault, rape), human trafficking, and bullying. And we also have an ongoing anti-corruption and a lost-found project. EduGame of anti-discrimination and anti-violence for toddlers to pre-teens. We also have a funeral service project . The volunteer networking and community learning hub. The crowdsharing for goods and food donation. And last but not least, the ZAKKI on the spot marketplace intended to cater to the beneficiaries (the elderly and people with disability) micro-business market exposure.

 ZAKKI provides equal volunteering opportunity for everyone regardless of age, sex/gender, color, race, creed, nationality/origin, marital status, sexual orientation, political belief, or disability that does not prohibit essential performance job functions. All matters relating to volunteering are based upon one’s ability to perform the job, as well as one’s dedication to ZAKKI’s Mission and needs.

  • Creative approach to problem-solving with the ability to focus on details while maintaining the “big picture” view   Specific Requirement: Knowledge of one or more of these skills below is preferred;

  • Screening resumes

  • Maintaining relationships with both internal and external clients to ensure staffing goals are achieved
  • Communicating employer information and benefits during screening process
  • Staying current on the company’s organization structure, personnel policy, and laws regarding employment practices
  • Serving as a liaison with area employment agencies, colleges, and industry associations

Whether you are a full-time student, recent graduate, or a mid-career professional, we would love to hear from you :)

What is RELAYTO/?

RELAYTO/ transforms customer-facing documents into interactive, visual, and mobile-ready experiences that boost and measure the impact of your ideas.

There is magic and genius in every person, you just need to share your ideas with the world. We believe everyone from salespeople and marketers to executives and HR can create content with character – all it takes is a great idea and an intuitive tool. We built the tool. Now is the time to unleash your ideas.

rla.to/pitch

AM I A GOOD FIT?

Regardless of background, we believe there exist individuals with entrepreneurial spirits, resilience, and an outcomes driven attitude, who with the right coaching and mentoring can achieve the near impossible.

We expect intern-preneurs at RELAYTO/ to approach his or her career like an entrepreneur: able and eager to get things done and willing to innovate with limited resources. They think ahead and want to learn how companies and careers grow.

We would especially like to hear from those professionals who are thinking of embarking on a change of career or a simple career break. Some of our top employees have come this route and we would love to have some more!

Sound like you? If yes and you have 20 hours to spare per week to change your life, read on :)

WHAT CAN RELAYTO/ DO FOR ME?

Gain a business education, startup experience, and some pretty amazing connections.

If you’re not ready to launch your own venture or don’t quite know who you want to be professionally, we are a great foundation. Get in on the ground floor of an awesome and innovative company – and have some fun along the way!

We equally love working with professionals with prior experience AND students, especially those who are looking fulfill course requirements and gain credits by completing an internship programme.

We are also a global team, with guys in London (next to Angel Tube) to Johannesburg. Flexibility is the key!


IDEAL SKILLS:


- Grit, determination and a never say die attitude;

- Growth mindset

- Love of ideation and storytelling;

- Knowledge of, and passion for, the power of communication solutions to drive change;

- A good understanding of business fundamentals. SaaS experience would be ideal!



DEPENDING ON YOUR EXPERIENCE LEVEL, RESPONSIBILITIES COULD INCLUDE:


- Owning research assignments

- Impacting or even leading Operations / Business Development / Sales / Marketing / Finance

- Assisting the Head of Operations / CEO in the day to day running of the company

- Building best practice processes that make us more efficient and effective as a team

- Leading & developing other interns
Assist in backend development. Debugging, site functionality enhancements, etc.  This is for a new project.

Job Description Summary

You will research and develop innovative ML strategies for challenging problems that will affect future Globalbluex products. You will collaborate with broader teams across Globalbluex to transfer AI/ML solutions. You will have opportunities to provide technical mentorship and guidance and prepare technical reports for publication and conference talks. You have strong programming skills with tried experience crafting, prototyping, and delivering advanced algorithmic solutions.

Benefits

  • CPT/OPT/STEM OPT sponsorship
  • A dynamic, ambitious and fun work environment
